full_summary:
=====================

### Title: Diving Equipment – Multiple NSN’s (W8482-231159/A)

#### ***Updated on December 22, 2022 (Publication Date) and January 4, 2023 (Amendment Date)***

This posting concerns a procurement opportunity announced by the Department of National Defence for Diving Equipment under multiple National Stock Numbers. The Solicitation Reference Number is W8482-231159/A, with details provided below.

**Procurement Details**
--------------------

*   **Solicitation Number:** W8482-231159/A
*   **Publication Date:** December 22, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 19, 2023 (14:00:00)
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Amendment Date:** January 4, 2023

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of various Diving Equipment items detailed below:

|   Item #   |  Item Description                | GSIN Code | NSN          | Quantity       | Unit of Issue       |
|------------|----------------------------------|-----------|--------------|----------------|----------------------|
|     1      | CYLINDER                         | N4220     | 4220-20-A0Y-7082|                14      | EA                   |
|     2      | CYLINDER, VALVE                  | N4820     | 4820-20-A0Y-6976|                14      | EA                   |
|     3      | REDUCER, VALVE                   | N4820     | 4820-20-A0Y-7080|                14      | EA                   |
|     4      | BLADER, HOSE                     | N4730     | 4730-20-A0Y-7077|                14      | EA                   |
|     5      | CYLINDER                         | N4220     | 4220-20-A0Y-7076|                26      | EA                   |
|     6      | CYLINDER, VALVE                  | N4820     | 4820-20-A0Y-6975|                26      | EA                   |
|     7      | CYLINDER, VALVE                  | N4820     | 4820-20-A0Y-7079|                26      | EA
